title: Game AIs
alt: The top computer champion at Seven Minutes in Heaven is a Honda-built Realdoll, but to date it has been unable to outperform the human Seven Minutes in Heaven champion, Ken Jennings.
transcript:
[A diagram with a caption above the diagram. The left column describes various levels of skill for the most capable computers in decreasing performance against humans.  The right side lists games in each particular section, in increasing game difficulty.  There are labels denoting the hard and easy ends of the diagram.]Caption: Difficulty of Various Games for ComputersTop of Diagram: EasySolved Computers can play perfectlySolved for all possible positionsTic-tac-toe
Nim
